description.brief: python utilities for ros using the wx environment

package.description: Provides a collection of frames and widgets that can be embedded in a wxpython program. It depends on MatplotLib to generate nice plots. A standalone application for querying and displaying plots from botherder can be found in demos. Note: you need WxPython to be installed on your machine
package.author: Timothy Hunter/tjhunter@willowgarage.com
